Relocation Tip.name: Relocation Tip
Relocation Tip.Content:
Narrator: So, you want to relocate your city? Great move—but don’t do it blindly!
✅ First, make sure ALL your troops and heroes are back in the city.
✅ Next, check your ETC inventory for teleport items:
- Territorial City Relocation (Blue): Moves you inside alliance territory
- City Relocation (Purple): Lets you move to a specific spot on the map
- Random City Relocation (Green): Teleports you to a random location
Relocation Tip.Pro Tip:
If you’ve just joined an alliance, you’ll want to move close to your Alliance Leader. Here's how:
- Tap the Alliance button
- Go to the Main Tab
- Tap the golden drop icon on the top left
- Find your leader's city and look for a nearby green space
- Use a Territorial Relocation to settle in
📌 Being near your alliance is key for rallying against barbarians, strongholds, and enemy gates. Teamwork is power!

Rally Tip.name: Rally Tip
Rally Tip.Content:
Rallies are a BIG part of team play—and scoring big rewards. Here's how to get in on the action:
Pick your target – fortress, gate, or stronghold
Tap it and select Rally
Set a prep time to give teammates a chance to join
Build your troop—use your strongest benders!
Hit March, and boom—you’ve started the rally!
If no one from your alliance joins the rally, it will be cancelled and you'll get your AP back.
🎺 To keep track, tap the trumpet icon in the bottom-right corner. From there, you can monitor who’s joined and how much time is left before the attack begins.

How To Use.name: How To Use
How To Use.Content:
🚀 How to Use ARCbot:

Welcome to ARCbot, your trusty guide to mastering the game! Ready to level up? Here's how:

Get Gameplay Tips: Use /tip <tip-name> to discover valuable tips for your journey. For example, type **/tip relocation-tip** to learn how to move your city! 🏙️

Explore Character Talent Trees: Want to know more about your favorite characters? Try commands like **/kyoshi talent-tree**, **/zuko talent-tree**, and **/korra talent-tree** to dive into their skill trees and unlock their potential! 🌟

🔍 Explore Character Skills!
Curious about your favorite characters? Discover their unique abilities by using commands like: **/kyoshi skills**, **/zuko skills**, **/korra skills** — and more! Uncover their full potential and master their skills.

Pro Tips & More: Many tips come with bonus "Pro Tips" to give you that extra edge. Plus, some include images to help you visualize key concepts. 📸

Simply use these commands, and you're all set to become a game master! 🎮 Need help? Just ask, and we’ll guide you!

Stay Active Tip.name: Stay Active Tip
Stay Active Tip.Content:
Time for a Pro-Player TIP #1 from Marshmallow

🔧 Don't let anything sit idle!

Keep your builders 👷, research lab 🧪, and tunnel 🚇 constantly working to maintain your growth 📈.

Always send out gatherers 🌾 (unless you're in the middle of a war ⚔️), as well as expeditions 🌍 and airships ✈️.

Plan ahead so nothing goes unused.

Hard work always pays off! 💪💥

Join An Active Alliance Tip.name: Join An Active Alliance Tip
Join An Active Alliance Tip.Content:
Pro Tip from kuvira : Join an active and productive alliance!

Choosing the right alliance makes a world of difference in Avatar Legends: Realms Collide. Here’s why:

🔹 Faster Growth: Get support from teammates to speed up construction and research. 📈
🔹 Stronger Rallies: Have allies ready to join your rallies and crush your enemies together. 🤜🤛
🔹 Epic Invasions: Fight side by side in invasions and conquer the battlefield. ⚔️

Don’t let a slow alliance hold you back – choose wisely and rise to the top!

Extra Outside Effort Tip.name: Extra Outside Effort Tip
Extra Outside Effort Tip.Content:
Pro-Player TIP #3 by Marshmallow 🔥!
Extra effort outside the game makes a big difference!

📲 Set alarms to remind yourself when to:
— Send gatherers 🌾
— Launch expeditions 🌍
— Use key resources 🧪

📊 Create a simple Google Sheet or Excel to track your items, speedups, and event prep.
The more you plan, the faster you grow! 📈

There’s nothing wrong with being diligent and passionate about the things you love ❤️
